attributes.action: change the selection criteria for MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No person wishing to serve in Parliament as an elected MP should be elegible unless and until they have served a minimun term of 5 years working in the private/public sector. If public sector the job concerned must in no way be connected to local or Govt politics.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
